Body:
"""Test create_storage_group_snapshot."""
with mock.patch.object(self.replication, 'create_resource') as mock_create:
    self.replication.create_storage_group_snapshot(self.data.
        storagegroup_name, 'snap_name')
    self.replication.create_storage_group_snapshot(self.data.
        storagegroup_name, 'snap_name', ttl=2, hours=True, secure=True)
    self.assertEqual(2, mock_create.call_count)
